sentences.en: CONCLUSION This can improve the veracity of test results.

sentences.en: Foker spoke strongly in favour of the Major's character for veracity and honour.

sentences.en: He tried to assess the veracity of the three legislators.
sentences.cn: 他反复掂量着那三位议员所说的话是否可靠.

sentences.en: He was shocked to find his veracity questioned.
sentences.cn: 发现自己的诚信受到了质疑，他很震惊。

sentences.en: I can testify to this man's veracity and good character.
sentences.cn: 我可以作证,此人诚实可靠,品德良好.

sentences.en: I don't doubt the veracity of your report.
sentences.cn: 我毫不怀疑你报告中的真实性.

sentences.en: I doubt the veracity of these data, please recheck them.
sentences.cn: 我对这些数据表示怀疑, 请你复验一次.

sentences.en: It is necessary to weigh the answers in accordance with the general veracity of the owner.
sentences.cn: 需要根据所有者的一般诚实程度来衡量其回答.

sentences.en: Its mainly character is automation, high veracity for focus and convenience controlling.
sentences.cn: 自动对焦最主要的特点是:自动 、 聚焦准确性高、操作方便.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE To improve the veracity of antibiotics titer evaluation by cylinder - plate method .

sentences.en: She was almost renowned in the congregation for this imperturbable veracity.
sentences.cn: 她因那种无可动摇的诚信,在教会里几乎是有口皆碑的.

sentences.en: The drifting baselines in chromatography affect the veracity of analysis gready.

sentences.en: The Secretary's letter questions my veracity and impugns my motives.
sentences.cn: 部长的来信怀疑我的诚实，质疑我的动机。

sentences.en: They questioned the veracity of her story.
sentences.cn: 他们质疑她所述事情的真实性。

sentences.en: We have total confidence in the veracity of our research.
sentences.cn: 我们对我们调查的真实性有十足的把握。
